file_content.text: Watch yourself on Corellia. The Voidwolf's tricked us both before.
I'm man enough to admit you saved my life. Guess that's worth a ship full of blasters.
You win. I'm just glad all the good you did the Republic was real and not another setup.
I'm throwing in the towel. You've built a rep more notorious than I could manage in ten years.
You win. You've walked a hell of a line to help the Republic while claiming yourself the throne of the underworld.
Say it again. I just want to savor this....
You're surrendering?
Savor the memory.
If we'd known the truth, maybe we could have teamed up sooner.
We work well together.
Don't think this means I'll be giving the toast at your wedding or anything.
What do we know about the Voidwolf's plans?
Let's focus on the war.
Beyond you and me, the Voidwolf's got most of the galactic underworld working for him or running scared.
He needs to go down, and I'm too old to do it. But I'll give you any weapons you need out of my personal vault.
Not that I'm turning down free stuff, but does that do me any good if we can't find the scum?
Do we know where he is?
Appreciate it.
That's it? You give me a few guns and sit this out on your couch?
Where will you be?
I've still got some credibility in the underworld--if you didn't destroy it. I'm going to rally who I can to aid the Republic.
The Voidwolf's flagship is at Corellia. He was part of the plot to force its government to sell out to the Empire.
My guess is Darmas and Dodonna are with him. You want to chase them, I can put you in touch with Curao, a fence I work with.
Glad I never managed to knock you off.
We're barely scratching them! Try to herd them toward the incinerator!
Does this make you proud? You fooled the Republic into drowning you in honors, while you fetch and heel for the Empire.
Maybe you'll kill me... but not before I show the galaxy that you're a traitor!
I'd hoped I was driving you crazy, but I never meant it literally.
You're insane.
You're the one who kidnaps Senators at the Voidwolf's request!
You're the traitor!
There's no one here to listen to your lies.
Every word we say just delays your death.
I'm not here to talk.
Hehe.
The joke's on you.
You're awfully trusting, Captain. A man helps you once, so you can trust him forever? A woman gets elected, so she'll be loyal to the office?
See what your "patrons" are saying now.
Once that idiot captain takes out Rogun, the rest of the gangs will fold. We'll have the whole underworld locked up.
Then the Voidwolf will keep his promise? When the Empire wins, I'll have a planet of my own?
I never got to thank you for rescuing them from Rogun at Port Nowhere.
Next time I see those two, there won't be enough left of them to smear on a sandwich.
I'm going to kill them.
I don't believe it....
No. It can't be....
I can't believe it. I know Dodonna! She wouldn't do this....
No. It can't be....
Does it insult your manhood, boy? Did you think your charms would be enough to claim her?
I don't believe it. Darmas wouldn't talk about me like that....
No. It can't be....
Is your heart broken, little girl? Did you think he'd make an honest woman of you?
All these missions... you were the one behind them?
It was you the whole time?
I never thought you'd survive the King's Ransom, but it was awful good-hearted of you to clear Rogun out of my way.
Darmas and Dodonna knew Rogun was getting close to the Voidwolf. That's why they set you on him.
When Ivory gave us Rogun's strongholds... that was just a hit list for the Voidwolf!
We were tricked.
The men executed for your crimes on Balmorra--they were his enemies.
Who knows what Darmas did with Trick and the pirates you sent him.
Who knows if Trick ever made it to the Jedi, or if Dodonna took him for the Voidwolf.
How could you not know who you're working for?
Now there's no one left to stand against me.
Since I'm dead anyway, what are you doing once you own the underworld? Gangsters make notoriously bad slaves....
What's your great plan?
There's still me and mine.
I'll stand against you.
What are you without my agents? Not a privateer. Not a crime lord. Everything you have, I gave you.
Okay, you've won. But I did the legwork. How about a partnership?
Let's work together.
You're not in my league.
He's put together a pirate fleet. The Republic expects an attack from outside, not from gangs within their borders.
Chane, Desora. Finish this off.
You were duped. Doesn't raise my opinion of you, but it does put us on the same side. I'll get your back, you get mine?
Let's see who's still standing when this is done.
Take your chances.
Divide and....
...conquer.
I don't trust you, but I don't think you're smart enough to do all this to trick me.
Deal.
Apparently it doesn't take that much.
How touching.
Too bad it ends here.
I'll take my chances with the Sith.
No deal.
I should have killed you on Ord Mantell.
